amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Secretary of the Interior to treat any gray wolf in any of the 48 contiguous States or the District of Columbia as an endangered species or threatened species under the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1531 et seq.) after June 13, 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 73 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit the use of funds by the U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service and the Department of Interior to treat any Gray Wolf in the 48 contiguous states as an endangered or threatened species under the Endangered Species Act after June 13, 2017.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 201 (Roll no. 452).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 201 (Roll no. 452).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
